Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

  • Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop
    Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
    Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop 
    Class and Description
    AbstractJoinPoint
    Abstract implementation of JoinPoint.
    AopProxy
    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework.
    AopProxy.ProxyType
    Indicates the backing implementation of a proxy.
    AspectComponent.Advice
    Encapsulates an "advice" contained within an aspect.
    DexMakerProxy
    Abstract implementation of AopProxy that relies on DexMaker in order to proxy non-final classes in addition to interfaces.
    JdkDynamicProxy
    Abstract implementation of AopProxy that relies on the JDK-provided Proxy in order to proxy interfaces.
    JoinPoint
    Provides contextual information about a join point.
    JoinPoint.AdviceLocation
    Describes the location of advice relative to the join point.
    JoinPoint.PointcutType
    Describes the type of pointcuts and how it's applied.
    Pointcut
    Contains a set of JoinPoint instances and a Class which the JoinPoints belong to.
    ProceedingJoinPoint
    Provides support for around advice by exposing the ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed() method.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl 
    Class and Description
    AbstractJoinPoint
    Abstract implementation of JoinPoint.
    AdvisedProxyFactory
    Factory for creating AopProxy instances.
    AopProxy
    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework.
    AspectComponent
    Encapsulates the notion of an "aspect", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties.
    AspectWeaver
    Responsible for generating advice-woven bytecode.
    DexMakerProxy
    Abstract implementation of AopProxy that relies on DexMaker in order to proxy non-final classes in addition to interfaces.
    JdkDynamicProxy
    Abstract implementation of AopProxy that relies on the JDK-provided Proxy in order to proxy interfaces.
    JoinPoint
    Provides contextual information about a join point.
    JoinPoint.AdviceLocation
    Describes the location of advice relative to the join point.
    Pointcut
    Contains a set of JoinPoint instances and a Class which the JoinPoints belong to.
    ProceedingJoinPoint
    Provides support for around advice by exposing the ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed() method.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di 
    Class and Description
    AopProxy
    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm 
    Class and Description
    AopProxy
    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework.
    DexMakerProxy
    Abstract implementation of AopProxy that relies on DexMaker in order to proxy non-final classes in addition to interfaces.
